name: CapsuleKing
description:
CapsuleKing Jump into the wild with our King! 

CapsuleKing is a medieval-based Low-poly game.

You play as an abandoned King who is forced to fight his way back to Glory!

Let's go and defeat the Wild and become The King In The Wild!

 

Get to Discord For Active updates about The Game! https://discord.gg/ZhQWBC5WcV

 

 

By ScorpGamer©2021
